data.text:
NOBARTV NEWS Southampton vs Lazio, Southampton will meet Lazio in this midweek match. This match was presented as a friendly match between clubs.

In the previous match, both teams recorded the same results. Southampton beat Millwall 0-1 while Lazio beat Frosinone 0-2.

FAQ Southampton FC vs SS Lazio, here are some frequently asked questions Match facts and data that we have prepared for you regarding this match:

What is the title of the match between Southampton versus Lazio?

This match is a friendly or pre-season match.

When will this match be played?

This match will be held on Thursday 8 August 2024 at 01.30 WIB.

In which stadium is the Southampton vs SS Lazio match played?

This match will be held at St Mary's Stadium. This stadium with a capacity of 32.384 people was first opened in 2001.

What is the record of the last meeting between the two teams?

The two teams have never met before.

Where were Southampton and Lazio ranked in their respective domestic competitions last season?

Southampton sits at #4 in the EFL Championship while Lazio is at #7 in Serie-A.

How have the two teams performed in their last five matches?

Southampton:

03/08/24 Millwall vs Southampton 0-1

01/08/24 Oxford Utd vs Southampton 2-0

27/07/24 Montpellier vs Southampton 1-3

24/07/24 Bordeaux vs Southampton 2-3

20/07/24 Eastleigh v Southampton 1-7

Lazio:

04/08/24 Frosinone vs Lazio 0-2

27/07/24 Hansa Rostock vs Lazio 0-3

21/07/24 Lazio vs Triestina 1-1

18/07/24 Lazio vs Trapani 3-1

14/07/24 Lazio vs Auronzo 23-0

Who are the players predicted to be included in the starting line up in this match?

Line-up Southampton: Alex McCarthy; Charlie Taylor, Jan Bednarek, Jack Stephens, Yukinari Sugawara; Flynn Downes, Taylor Hardwood-Bellis; Samuel Edozie, Will Smallbone, Joe Aribo; Adam Armstrong

Coach: Russell Martin

Line-up Lazio: Ivan Provedel; Adam Marusic, Patric, Nicolo Casale, Manuel Lazzari; Nico Rovella, Matias Vecino, Matteo Guendouzi; Mattia Zaccagni, Valentin Castellanos, Gustav Isaksen

Coach: Marco Baroni

Which players are confirmed to be absent from this match?

Southampton: -

Lazio: -

Who is the referee who will officiate this match?

TBC (to be confirmed)

What formation will the two teams use?

Southampton: 4-3-3

Lazio: 3-4-3

What is the predicted score for Southampton vs Lazio?

Southampton is predicted to win with a final score of 1-0.

Where can I watch this fight?

You can watch the match live online via NOBARTV special menu below.
